featured.text: The name comes from the sound the sandals make when they slap the walking feet.

definition.zh_def: 用手掌或其他物體輕拍或打擊某物，通常發出聲音。
definition.en_def: To hit someone or something with the palm of the hand or a flat object, often making a sound.
definition.example: She gave him a playful slap on the arm.
